title: S3 Ep119: The Possession of Laura w/Fr. Andrew Calder & Chip Coffey - Hr.2
itunes:title: The Possession of Laura w/Fr. Andrew Calder & Chip Coffey - Hr.2
description:
Darkness Radio welcomes Father Andrew Calder and Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey to the show to talk about their involvement in an on camera possession case on the A and E television show, "Paranormal State". 

Father Calder and Chip give some behind the scenes looks and give some do and don'ts when dealing with possessed individuals on this hour of the program.
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
